Project Status & Future Work

Status

As of November 2016


  • Designed basic benchmark model & developed R codes for the whole process
  • Analysed Mumbai-Delhi & Delhi-Gawahati routes and validated various hypotheses
  • Tested the accuracy of D-Trees, Random Forest SVM , GBM and various mathematical models


Future Work


  • Extend this study to more routes in India
  • Try other machine learning & mathematical models to improve accuracy
  • Develop a user interface for the model
